name: Chicken Alfredo
directions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and cook chicken until no longer pink.
In a saucepan, melt butter and cook garlic until fragrant. Add cream and simmer.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and combine with cooked pasta and chicken.

name: Beef Tacos
directions: Cook beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned. Drain.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
directions: Heat oil in a skillet and cook chicken until no longer pink. Remove and set aside.
In the same skillet, cook vegetables until tender.
Stir in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger and return chicken to skillet. Stir until heated through.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
directions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a pot and cook onion, carrot, and celery until softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned. Drain.
Add tomatoes, garlic, and wine and simmer until sauce thickens. Serve over cooked pasta with Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Salmon
directions: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dill, salt, and pepper and marinate salmon for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill and cook salmon for about 4-6 minutes per side.
